name: iprscan2bsml
description: convert iprscan btab output to BSML

options.description: Input tab-delimited file from an iprscan search.
Full path to FASTA file containing query sequence. This allows the creation of a Sequence element in BSML even if there are no matches.
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
Optional. Non-zero value will give you a compressed bsml file. If output does not contain a .gz extension, it will be added automatically.
